channel.title: mathematical physics on Ryan Moodie
channel.description: Recent content in mathematical physics on Ryan Moodie

item.title: YTF20 presentation: introduction to precision QCD
item.description: I was on the committee for the YTF 2019 and YTF 2020 conferences. For YTF20, I also gave a non-specialist talk on precision QCD. The talk is recorded and the slides are available here (source) (discussion of tech).

item.title: Infrared factorisation properties of QCD amplitudes
item.description: I typed up some notes (pdf) (source) about this.

item.title: PhD first year report: real QCD corrections
item.description: The time has come for my first year progress assessment. Here’s my report (source). This draws together my studies of: Modern techniques in calculating scattering amplitudes (notes) Spinor helicity formalism (source) Colour algebra for squared amplitudes (notes) QCD corrections to the cross section of electron-positron annihilation to hadrons (source) (notes)
